abstract: Homebuilder DR Horton reports first-quarter profit of $142.5 million, or 39 cents a share, up 37 percent from $123.2 million, or 36 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: D.R. Horton reported a 37 percent jump in quarterly revenue as it delivered more homes.
snippet: D.R. Horton reported a 37 percent jump in quarterly revenue as it delivered more homes.

headline.main: Homebuilder’s Revenues Are Higher Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Homebuilder’s Revenues Are Higher Than Expected
